RTCIceTransportGetLocalParameters.summary:
The method
getLocalParameters() returns an
object which provides information uniquely identifying
the local peer for the duration of the ICE session.

remarks.para:
The local peer's parameters are obtained during ICE signaling and delivered to the
transport when the client calls .

RTCIceTransportGetLocalParameters.returns:
An object indicating the
and
which uniquely identify the local
peer for the duration of the ICE session.Returns null if the parameters have not yet been received.
